_comment: This file is OVERWRITTEN each security review. Do NOT append to it.

ssh_attacks.change_since_last: +29 attempts since last review (16635 -> 16664). Attack rate stable. 80.94.92.40 up to 390 (was 389). 2 new unique IPs (345 -> 347).

known_issues: World-writable API files (action-queue.json, action-status.json, postmortems.json) - required for CGI, mitigated by whitelist validation
tasks.md in webroot intentionally exposed for task viewer feature - contains non-sensitive task data only
Git history contains pattern matches for secret-like keywords - audit confirms these are search patterns in scripts, not actual credentials
notes: 66.116.226.147 steady at 840 attempts - tied with top attacker
195.3.147.75 at 395 attempts - aggressive attacker from prior review
Total failed SSH attempts: 16664 (+29 since last review ~34 mins ago)
2 new unique IPs since last review (345 -> 347)
All nginx protections verified working - all sensitive file types return 404
Path traversal blocked (direct returns 404, URL-encoded returns 400)
SSH key permissions correct (600), SSH dir correct (700)
JS secret matches are URL paths to /secrets-audit feature, not actual credentials
recommendations: Install fail2ban for SSH protection - STRONGLY RECOMMENDED given 16k+ attacks
Consider rate limiting on web endpoints
